---

---

    {`Lockup some token to be claimed by another user under set conditions`}
  </title>
  <meta charSet="utf-8" />
  <meta
    property="og:title"
    content="Write a timelock implementing a claimable balance."
  />
  <meta
    property="og:description"
    content="Write a timelock that implements a simplified claimable balance feature that accepts a deposit of an amount of a token and allows other users to claim it."
  />
</head>

The [timelock example] demonstrates how to write a timelock and implements a greatly simplified claimable balance similar to the [claimable balance] feature available on Stellar.

[![Open in Codespaces](https://github.com/codespaces/badge.svg)][open-in-github-codespaces]

[![Open in Codeanywhere](https://codeanywhere.com/img/open-in-codeanywhere-btn.svg)][open-in-code-anywhere]

The contract accepts deposits of an amount of a token, and allows other users to claim it before or after a time point.

[open-in-code-anywhere]: https://app.codeanywhere.com/#https://github.com/stellar/soroban-examples
[timelock example]: https://github.com/stellar/soroban-examples/tree/v22.0.1/timelock
